# weakObjects()

**Type Method**

Returns a new hash table for storing weak references to its contents.

## Declaration

```swift
class func weakObjects() -> NSHashTable<ObjectType>
```

## Return Value

A new hash table that uses the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/weakMemory] options and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/objectPersonality] and has an initial capacity of `0`.

## Convenience Constructors

- **init(options:)**: Returns a hash table with given pointer functions options.

items.description: Returns a hash table with given pointer functions options.
